title: Touching Heaven
lyrics:
There’s a place, here and now
Where we see all of Your glory
Miracles, healing power
I believe Spirit is for me
All my shame goes away

When I reach up a little higher

In Your space I will stay

With all Your love I’m feeling lighter

Like I’m touching Heaven



Oh oh oh

Like I'm touching Heaven

Oh oh oh



I raise my hands, You fill me up

The weight of grace lifts me to freedom

So here I am, I’m coming close

I’m unafraid and You are the reason



All my fear disappears

When I reach up a little higher

And right here, You come near

With all Your love I’m feeling lighter

Like I’m touching heaven



Oh oh oh

Like I'm touching Heaven

Oh oh oh

Like I'm touching Heaven

Oh oh oh

Like I'm touching Heaven

Oh oh oh



And even if I can't see the light of day

And even if I stumble and hit the ground

I know Your hand will guide me along the way

Oh I can feel it now, now, now, now

Yeah, I can feel it now, now, now, now

Oh, I can feel it now, now, now, now

Yeah I can feel it now

Like I’m touching heaven



Oh oh oh

Like I'm touching Heaven

Oh oh oh

Like I'm touching Heaven

Oh oh oh

Like I'm touching Heaven

Oh oh oh

Like I'm touching Heaven
